text: Lindsay was seen having an explosive argument with her fiancé, Egor Tarabasov last weekend in a video obtained by The Sun, accusing him of infidelity and of trying to kill her.
title: Lindsay Lohan spotted sipping a beer, smoking (again) amid pregnancy rumors
